sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import './buttons.css'
import {useSpring, config,animated } from 'react-spring'
import Styles from './animation' 


export const ButtonPopRight = ({radius,min=0,grow}) => {
    const [length, setLength] =useSpring(() => ({xwidth:"75%", height:"75%"}))
    const [divLength, setDivLength] =useSpring(() => ({width:radius,height:radius,"min-width":min,"min-height":min}))
    return ( 
        <animated.div className="button" 
            style={divLength}
            onMouseEnter={() => {
                setDivLength({width:grow,height:radius,"min-width":min,"min-height":min})
                setLength({width:"200%", height:"75%"})
            }}
            onMouseLeave={() => {
                setDivLength({width:radius,height:radius,"min-width":min,"min-height":min})
                setLength({width:"75%", height:"75%"})
            }}
            >
            <svg className="buttonSVG" 
                xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
                width="100%"
                height="100%"
                version="1.1"
                viewBox="0 0 16.835 15.632"
                >
                <defs>
                    <filter
                    id="filter973"
                    width="1.278"
                    height="1.306"
                    x="-0.139"
                    y="-0.153"
                    colorInterpolationFilters="sRGB"
                    >
                    <feGaussianBlur stdDeviation="0.763"></feGaussianBlur>
                    </filter>
                </defs>
                <g
                    fillOpacity="1"
                    strokeWidth="0.008"
                    transform="translate(-54.046 -143.913)"
                >
                    <animated.rect
                    width = {length.width}
                    height={length.height}
                    x="56.2"
                    y="145.744"
                    fill="#d9d9d9ff"
                    filter="url(#filter973)"
                    opacity="0.799"
                    rx="5.476"
                    ry="5.985"
                    style={{ mixBlendMode: "normal" }}
                    ></animated.rect>
                    <animated.rect
                    width = {length.width}
                    height={length.height}
                    x="56.2"
                    y="146.041"
                    fill="#fff"
                    rx="6.065"
                    ry="5.666"
                    ></animated.rect>
                </g>
            </svg>
        </animated.div> 
    );
}
